Metadata.metaTitle: GLADIUS - Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu School in Tbilisi
Metadata.metaDescription: GLADIUS is a martial arts school in Tbilisi, Georgia specializing in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, Krav Maga, and MMA for all ages and skill levels.

Schedule.title: Our Schedule
Schedule.intro: We offer a variety of classes for all ages and skill levels. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced martial artist, we have something for you.

VideoBlock.videoError: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Please use a modern browser.

Classes.title: Our Classes
Classes.intro:
Gladius Club is the central Tbilisi club of the Georgian National Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu Federation, where a special unified development program has been created for children.

Children aged 5 to 14 follow a unified training system, which means not focusing on a single discipline, but achieving comprehensive martial, physical, and psychological development. The program combines Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu GI and NO-GI, self-defense in extreme conditions (Krav Maga), judo, sports psychology, and strict discipline.

Learning these disciplines together is significantly more effective and result-oriented than studying them separately â€” both in sports competitions and in real-life, non-sport situations where quick thinking, adaptability, and control are essential.
Classes.bjjKidsDesc: Develops calm problem-solving skills, body control, patience, and self-confidence applicable to daily life.
Classes.bjjAdultsDesc: Teaches quick reactions to real threats, practical self-defense skills, and proper risk assessment in everyday situations.
Classes.kravKidsDesc: Builds emotional resilience, stress management skills, self-confidence, and goal-focused concentration.
Classes.kravAdultsDesc: Improve focus, decision-making, organization, and a strong sense of responsibility in school and daily activities.
Classes.mmaKidsDesc: Kids MMA is a mixed martial arts program designed for children. It combines elements of various martial arts, including Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, Muay Thai, and wrestling. The program focuses on building confidence, discipline, and respect while providing practical self-defense skills.
Classes.mmaAdultsDesc: MMA (Mixed Martial Arts) is a full-contact combat sport that allows a wide variety of fighting techniques and skills from a mixture of other combat sports to be used in competition. It is a combination of striking and grappling techniques from various martial arts disciplines, including boxing, Muay Thai, Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, wrestling, and more. MMA training helps improve physical fitness, self-defense skills, and mental toughness.

PromoSections.promoDescFree: Come to an introductory session free of charge - get acquainted with the atmosphere and methodology of our trainers.
PromoSections.promoDescIndividual: We assess your level, set goals, and create a program for you: weight loss, tone, or competitive preparation.
PromoSections.promoDescSchedule: Classes are held 5 days a week, with the possibility of choosing the time and day of classes. We are always happy to see you at training!
PromoSections.promoDescMasterClasses: We regularly host seminars and open lessons with experienced trainers and athletes. Stay tuned for updates!

About.aboutDescription: GLADIUS is a martial arts school located in Tbilisi, Georgia. We specialize in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu (BJJ), Krav Maga, and MMA. Our experienced coaches are dedicated to providing high-quality training for all levels, from beginners to advanced practitioners. We believe in creating a supportive and inclusive environment where everyone can learn and grow.
